languages.text: "Отвратительный, отвратительный инцидент! Не могу поверить, что эти негодяи посмели подобраться так близко, еще и втянули в это дворянство... Раз они проникли в поместье, им явно помог кто-то из никчемных слуг. Сейчас охрана допрашивает выживших, но виновного пока не нашли. Пока". {n}Атилиус Квинт неприятно улыбается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Отвратительный, отвратительный инцидент! Не могу поверить, что эти негодяи посмели подобраться так близко, еще и втянули в это дворянство Януса... Раз они проникли в поместье, им явно помог кто-то из никчемных слуг. Сейчас охрана допрашивает выживших слуг, но виновного пока не нашли. Пока". {n}Атилиус Квинт неприятно улыбается.{/n}

languages.text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Отвратительный, отвратительный инцидент! Не могу поверить, что эти негодяи посмели подобраться так близко, еще и втянули в это дворянство... Раз они проникли в поместье, им явно помог кто-то из никчемных слуг. Сейчас охрана допрашивает выживших, но виновного пока не нашли. Пока". {n}Атилиус Квинт неприятно улыбается.{/n}

If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

languages.text: “这件事情非常可耻，简直是太可耻了！我真不敢相信，那群人渣居然敢跑到这么近的地方，还把贵族也卷入了这场风波之中……既然他们入侵了庄园内部，那就说明有的仆人吃里扒外，或是他们还有别的什么帮手。安保部门正在审问幸存的袭击者，但目前还没有找到罪魁祸首，暂时没有。”{n}阿蒂利乌斯露出了不悦的笑容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这件事情非常可耻，简直是太可耻了！我真不敢相信，那群人渣居然敢跑到这么近的地方，还把贵族也卷入了这场风波之中……既然他们入侵了庄园内部，那就说明有的仆人吃里扒外，或是他们还有别的什么帮手。安保部门正在审问幸存的袭击者，但目前还没有找到罪魁祸首，暂时没有。”{n}阿蒂利乌斯露出了不悦的笑容。{/n}

languages.text: «Un incidente ignominioso, ¡sencillamente ignominioso! No puedo creer que esos canallas osaran acercarse tanto, y además arrastrar a la nobleza a su ruin traición... Si han entrado en la mansión, significa que alguno de nuestros execrables sirvientes les han ayudado. Seguridad está interrogando a los supervivientes, pero no han encontrado al responsable... aún». {n}Atilius Quint esboza una sonrisa desagradable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Un incidente ignominioso, ¡sencillamente ignominioso! No puedo creer que esos canallas osaran acercarse tanto, y además arrastrar a la nobleza a su ruin traición... Si han entrado en la mansión, significa que alguno de nuestros execrables sirvientes les han ayudado. Seguridad está interrogando a los supervivientes, pero no han encontrado al responsable... aún». {n}Atilius Quint esboza una sonrisa desagradable.{/n}

languages.text: 「恥ずべき出来事でした。全くの恥です！あんな悪党がすぐそばまで迫ってこようとしていたばかりか、貴族階級が巻き込まれるなんて信じられません…。もし屋敷への侵入を許したということは、ろくでもない従者か誰かが手引きしていたということでしょう。今は警備の者が生存者に事情聴取をしていますが、まだ犯人は見つかっていません」{n}アティリウス・クィントは苦々しくほほえむ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「恥ずべき出来事でした。全くの恥です！あんな悪党がすぐそばまで迫ってこようとしていたばかりか、貴族階級が巻き込まれるなんて信じられません…。もし屋敷への侵入を許したということは、ろくでもない従者か誰かが手引きしていたということでしょう。今は警備の者が生存者に事情聴取をしていますが、まだ犯人は見つかっていません」{n}アティリウス・クィントは苦々しくほほえむ。{/n}

languages.text: "Ein schändlicher Vorfall, einfach schändlich! Ich kann nicht glauben, dass diese Schurken es gewagt haben, sich so weit zu nähern und auch noch den Adel mit hineinzuziehen ... Ihr Eindringen in das Anwesen bedeutet, dass sie Hilfe von einem wertlosen Diener oder so gehabt haben müssen. Sicherheitskräfte befragen derzeit die Überlebenden, aber der Schuldige wurde nicht gefunden. Noch nicht." {n}Atilius Quint setzt ein unangenehmes Lächeln auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ein schändlicher Vorfall, einfach schändlich! Ich kann nicht glauben, dass diese Schurken es gewagt haben, sich so weit zu nähern und auch noch den Adel mit hineinzuziehen ... Ihr Eindringen in das Anwesen bedeutet, dass sie Hilfe von einem wertlosen Diener oder so gehabt haben müssen. Sicherheitskräfte befragen derzeit die Überlebenden, aber der Schuldige wurde nicht gefunden. Noch nicht." {n}Atilius Quint setzt ein unangenehmes Lächeln auf.{/n}

languages.text: « C'était un incident tout bonnement honteux ! Je n'arrive pas à croire que ces scélérats ont osé s'infiltrer sur place et mêler la noblesse à cette histoire... S'ils ont réussi à s'introduire dans le domaine, cela signifie forcément qu'un serviteur indigne leur a apporté son aide. Nos agents de sécurité sont en train d'interroger les survivants, mais nous n'avons pas encore trouvé le coupable. Cela ne saurait tarder, » {n}conclut Atilius Quint avec un sourire dérangeant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'était un incident tout bonnement honteux ! Je n'arrive pas à croire que ces scélérats ont osé s'infiltrer sur place et mêler la noblesse à cette histoire... S'ils ont réussi à s'introduire dans le domaine, cela signifie forcément qu'un serviteur indigne leur a apporté son aide. Nos agents de sécurité sont en train d'interroger les survivants, mais nous n'avons pas encore trouvé le coupable. Cela ne saurait tarder, » {n}conclut Atilius Quint avec un sourire dérangeant.{/n}

languages.text: "Yüz kızartıcı, utanç verici bir olay! Bu alçakların içimize girip işe soyluları da bulaştırmaya cesaret ettiğine inanamıyorum. Konağa girdilerse aşağılık bir hizmetkârdan yardım almışlar demektir. Güvenlik, hayatta kalanları sorguluyor lakin suçlu henüz bulunamadı. Yakında bulunur..." {n}Atilius Quint'in yüzüne nahoş bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A disgraceful incident, simply disgraceful! I cannot believe these scoundrels would dare to come so close, and to drag the nobility into this as well... If they penetrated the estate, that means they had help from some worthless servant or other. Security is currently questioning the survivors, but the culprit has not been found. Yet." {n}Atilius Quint smiles unpleasantly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Yüz kızartıcı, utanç verici bir olay! Bu alçakların içimize girip işe soyluları da bulaştırmaya cesaret ettiğine inanamıyorum. Malikâneye girdilerse aşağılık bir hizmetkârdan yardım almışlar demektir. Güvenlik, hayatta kalanları sorguluyor lakin suçlu henüz bulunamadı. Yakında bulunur..." {n}Atilius Quint'in yüzüne nahoş bir gülümseme yayılıyor.{/n}
